text: Marcel Uderzo (20 December 1933 – 24 January 2021) was a French comic book artist. He was the younger brother of fellow comic book artist Albert Uderzo. He made ink boards for Asterix. His last Asterix work was Asterix in Belgium. Uderzo died on 24 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Évreux, France at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:People from Seine-Saint-Denis Category:French comics artists
title: Marcel Uderzo
